name: Dr. Satish Kumar
description: Dr. Satish Kumar is a renowned cardiologist with over 10 years of experience in treating heart-related conditions. He is known for his patient-centric approach and advanced treatment methods.

name: Dr. Tarun Kumar
description: Dr. Tarun Kumar is a skilled cardiologist with a decade of experience in diagnosing and treating heart diseases. He is committed to providing personalized care to his patients.

name: Dr. Umesh Kumar
description: Dr. Umesh Kumar is a dedicated sexologist with a wealth of experience in addressing sexual health issues. He takes a compassionate approach to patient care.
